text: Leptoscyphus azoricus is a species of liverwort in the Geocalycaceae family. It is endemic to Portugal. ==References== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Leptoscyphus azoricus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Leptoscyphus azoricus
